overview: Kamal's wife dies and leaves him with his son Omar. Kamal gets to know Salwa and the love between them joins them. Salwa asks Kamal to defend her neighbor, Ismail, who is accused of murder. Kamal and his partner in the office, Ahmed, are excited about the case. Kamal concludes that the dead man discovered embezzlement in the factory.  Some people kidnap Omar and threaten to kill Kamal if he doesn't drop the case.
title: المحاكمة
